Save when you see a shiny in case something goes wrong and during the battle if things start to go south
If you knock the Pok√©mon out, and you throw a ball while it is stunned and it breaks out, soft reset (close the game and restart) to try again
Check you have balls, healed Pok√©mon, and healing items before engaging

sections.title: Shiny Hunting Methods
